title: Customer Cancels an Order
description: A customer calls to cancel an order they placed earlier in the day.

tasks.description: Identify the order the customer wishes to cancel.
Check the order's status to ensure it has not yet been shipped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the order has not shipped.

tasks.description: Cancel the order in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the sales order.

tasks.description: Send a cancellation confirmation to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives an email confirming the cancellation.
